fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a Warfleet member to permanently Upgrade at night. (0 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of every even-numbered night, you will gain a use for your Upgrade ability.
- You may Upgrade yourself.
- Detection Immunity

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- Your Defense will increase for each living Upgraded Warfleet member in the game, other than yourself.
- If you try to Upgrade a player who has reached their final form, you will instead present them with a choice in the following day: Increase either their Attack or their Defense for the following night.
